item.title: Getting started with Boost, Python, and Numpy
item.description: As much as we might want all code that we work with to be professional-quality packages in the same language we are working in, it simply won’t be the case for the vast majority of us. Recently, I was investigating how we could replace some perl wrappers that executed C code with something more pythonic. I came across boost - a package designed to try and make exposing C/C++ interfaces a bit simpler to python programs.
